story: You come across a futuristic vending machine with blinking neon lights. It seems to offer more than just refreshments - could it be the key to your next mission?

actions.action: Insert a chip into the machine's interface
actions.good: The machine reveals a hidden menu, displaying critical information about your next target. Your technological expertise pays off.
actions.bad: Your attempt to access the machine's hidden menu triggers a security alarm. The vending machine spews out hot coffee, scalding you in the process.

actions.action: Interact with the machine's touchscreen interface
actions.good: By tapping and swiping on the machine's touchscreen, you uncover a secret message, detailing your next mission. Your tech-savvy skills come in handy.
actions.bad: Your interaction with the machine attracts unwanted attention from nearby security guards. They subdue you and confiscate any loot you might have been carrying.

actions.good: You walk away, unaware that the machine held valuable information all along. You never look back.
actions.bad: As you leave the vending machine behind, a holographic image materializes before your eyes, warning you of imminent danger in your path. Your disregard for the machine's hidden secrets may come back to haunt you.
